name: Solianka or Russian Beef Soup
author: Karena
summary: This is a traditional Russian soup that is served as a meal by itself. Vodka is usually served with it. Garnish with fresh lemon slices and sour cream.
ingredients: ¼ pound kielbasa sausage, cut into 1 inch pieces
1 (28 ounce) can Italian-style whole peeled tomatoes
⅓ cup chopped fresh dill weed
directions: Soak mushrooms in 3/4 cup water until tender, 20 to 30 minutes
Melt half the butter and saute the onions, meats, and rehydrated mushrooms
Add the stock and liquid from the mushrooms and bring to a boil
Make a bouquet garni by tying the bay leaves and peppercorns tightly in cheesecloth
Lower the heat and add the bouquet garni, pickles, capers, and marinated mushrooms
Melt remaining butter in a skillet and cook the tomatoes and tomato paste for a few minutes, then add the flour and saute for another few minutes
Add a cup of the soup to the skillet and stir in well, then return pan ingredients to the soup pot
Add the olives, dill, marjoram, garlic, pickle juice, and paprika
Adjust soup's seasoning with salt and pepper; simmer another 10-15 minutes
Remove pot from heat and remove bouquet garni
Adjust seasonings and serve with sour cream and lemon
